3 OdometryHelper::OdometryHelper()
4 {
5  yaw = 0.0;
6  pitch = 0.0;
7  roll = 0.0;
8  dt = 0.0;
9  drivenDistance = 0.0;
10  speed = 0.0;
11  drivingDirection = 0;
12  prevDirection = 0;
13  wxOffset = 0.0;
14  wyOffset = 0.0;
15  wzOffset = 0.0;
16  axOffset = 0.0;
17  ayOffset = 0.0;
18  azOffset = 0.0;
19  dataCount = 0;
20  imuCalibrated = false;
21  oldTimeStamp = ros::Time::now();
22  odometric.setK(
23  0.25); // set distance between front axis and back axis (in meters)
24 }
25 
26 void OdometryHelper::updateSensorData(const sensor_msgs::Imu& imuData,
27  const double hallDt, const int motor)
28 {
29  calcDt(imuData.header.stamp, oldTimeStamp);
30  if (imuCalibrated)
31  {
32  this->imuData.angular_velocity.x = imuData.angular_velocity.x - wxOffset;
33  this->imuData.angular_velocity.y = imuData.angular_velocity.y - wyOffset;
34  this->imuData.angular_velocity.z = imuData.angular_velocity.z - wzOffset;
35  this->imuData.linear_acceleration.x =
36  imuData.linear_acceleration.x - axOffset;
37  this->imuData.linear_acceleration.y =
38  imuData.linear_acceleration.y - ayOffset;
39  this->imuData.linear_acceleration.z =
40  imuData.linear_acceleration.z - azOffset;
41  calcRPY();
42  }
43  else
44  this->imuData = imuData;
45  calibrateIMU();
46  this->hallDt = hallDt;
47  updateMotorLevel(motor);
48  calcSpeed();
49  calcDeltaDistance();
50  calcDrivenDistance();
51  calcPosition();
52  oldTimeStamp = imuData.header.stamp;
53 }
54 
55 void OdometryHelper::updateMotorLevel(const int motorLevel)
56 {
57  this->motorLevel = motorLevel;
58  prevDirection = drivingDirection;
59  if (motorLevel < 0)
60  drivingDirection = -1;
61  else if (motorLevel > 0)
62  drivingDirection = 1;
63  else
64  drivingDirection = 0;
65 }

75 double OdometryHelper::getVx() const { return speed * std::cos(yaw); }
76 
77 double OdometryHelper::getVy() const { return speed * std::sin(yaw); }
78 
79 const double& OdometryHelper::getWz() const { return imuData.angular_velocity.z; }

81 void OdometryHelper::getQuaternion(geometry_msgs::Quaternion& quat) const
82 {
83  quat = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromYaw(yaw);
84 }

90 const bool& OdometryHelper::isImuCalibrated() const { return imuCalibrated; }

92 void OdometryHelper::calcDt(const ros::Time& currentTimeStamp,
93  const ros::Time& oldTimeStamp)
94 {
95  dt = (currentTimeStamp - oldTimeStamp).toSec();
96 }
97 
98 void OdometryHelper::calibrateIMU()
99 {
100  if (dataCount < 50 && imuData.angular_velocity.z != 0)
101  {
102  dataCount++;
103  wxOffset += imuData.angular_velocity.x;
104  wyOffset += imuData.angular_velocity.y;
105  wzOffset += imuData.angular_velocity.z;
106  axOffset += imuData.linear_acceleration.x;
107  ayOffset += imuData.linear_acceleration.x;
108  azOffset += (imuData.linear_acceleration.z - STANDARD_GRAVITY);
109  }
110  else if (dataCount == 50 && !imuCalibrated)
111  {
112  wxOffset /= dataCount;
113  wyOffset /= dataCount;
114  wzOffset /= dataCount;
115  axOffset /= dataCount;
116  ayOffset /= dataCount;
117  azOffset /= dataCount;
118  imuCalibrated = true;
119  }
120 }
121 
122 void OdometryHelper::calcRPY() {
123  integrateEulerAngles(imuData.angular_velocity.x, roll);
124  integrateEulerAngles(imuData.angular_velocity.y, pitch);
125  integrateEulerAngles(imuData.angular_velocity.z, yaw);
126 }
127 
128 void OdometryHelper::integrateEulerAngles(const double& dAngle, double& angle)
129 {
130  double result = angle + dAngle * dt;
131  if (result > M_PI)
132  {
133  angle = -2 * M_PI + result;
134  }
135  else if (result < -M_PI)
136  {
137  angle = 2 * M_PI + result;
138  }
139  else
140  {
141  angle = result;
142  }
143 }
144 
145 void OdometryHelper::calcSpeed()
146 {
147  if (!std::isnan(hallDt))
148  {
149  speed = drivingDirection * DRIVEN_DISTANCE_PER_TICK / hallDt;
150  }
151  else
152  {
153  if (prevDirection != drivingDirection)
154  speed = 0;
155  else if (drivingDirection == 0)
156  speed = 0;
157  }
158 }
159 
160 void OdometryHelper::calcDeltaDistance()
161 {
162  deltaDistance =
163  std::isnan(hallDt) ? 0.0 : drivingDirection * DRIVEN_DISTANCE_PER_TICK;
164 }
165 
166 void OdometryHelper::calcDrivenDistance()
167 {
168  drivenDistance = drivenDistance + deltaDistance;
169 }
170 void OdometryHelper::calcPosition()
171 {
172  std::vector<double> pos = odometric.getUpdateWithGyro(yaw, deltaDistance);
173  position.x = pos.at(1);
174  position.y = -pos.at(0);
175  position.z = 0.0;
176 }
